posts.post_title: SOLD 2 t206 miscut with names on top and fact number on top
posts.post_content:

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/t206HofmanPied350sub252name2fact01small.jpg[/IMG]
